response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the bottom cabinet. The next step is to take out the platter from the bottom cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the potato
(4) Cook the potato
(5) Move to the bottom cabinet
(6) Open the bottom cabinet
(7) Take out the platter
(8) Put the cooked potato on the platter
(9) Move to the breakfast table
(10) Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Take out the platter
    platter = registry(env,"platter_92")
    EasyGrasp(robot, platter)
    donothing(env)
